anathema: Disobey a superior, shirk your duties, destroy a book
edict: Work hard and demand others do so as well, cooperate or avoid conflict with ophidian creatures

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 318

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Work hard and demand others do so as well, cooperate or avoid conflict with ophidian creatures

**Anathema** Disobey a superior, shirk your duties, destroy a book

**Area of Concern**
Obedience, reward of service, runes

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=404)

**Domains** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=82), [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=122)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=109)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Message Rune](/Spells.aspx?ID=2356)

- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=1516)

- **5th**
[Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1692)

</column>
name: Lissala (The Sihedron Scion)
